Name: Lollo Campaign: Navigation V
Description: The Day 5 Campaign content has been updated, but a courier has encountered difficulties and is calling for help…
QuestDesc: The Day 5 Campaign content has been updated, but a courier has encountered difficulties and is calling for help…

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Gloves, boots, spare crates, and emergency rations... All that's left is...

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, it's you, {PlayerName}. Just in time to show you another feature of "Lollo Navigator."

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Lollo Navigator can give couriers info on supply wear and consumption along the route based on real-time geographical and road conditions.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And whenever they need a resupply, they can just request it through the app. This batch of orders is still missing some items.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Would you mind helping me prepare a few Basic Nutrient Blocks and then give them to the recipient couriers?

Options.PlotLineKey: It feels like I've done this before.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lollo Logistics Courier
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh. You're such a great help. The speed, this quality... I didn't expect "Lollo Navigator" actually meant it when it said, "Apply user experience as a closed-loop evaluation standard."

Options.PlotLineKey: Feels like I've heard of this one before.
This guy never changes, all right.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lollo Logistics Courier
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank you so much. I should get back to work. Once I finish this batch of orders, I'll be sure to give you a five-star rating!

Dialogues.Speaker: Lollo Logistics Courier
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh. You're such a great help. The speed, this quality... I didn't expect "Lollo Navigator" actually meant it when it said, "Apply user experience as a closed-loop evaluation standard."

Options.PlotLineKey: Feels like I've heard of this one before.
This guy never changes, all right.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lollo Logistics Courier
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank you so much. I should get back to work. Once I finish this batch of orders, I'll be sure to give you a five-star rating!
